Class Item

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains all the information about an Item object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Item

        Item(java.util.Scanner s)
throws Item.NoItemException,
     Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException
        Constructor for Item objects reads in from the input scanner for the values of each Item
        Parameters:
        s - scanner object for initializing the items in the dungeon
        Throws:
        Item.NoItemException - Signals that there is no Item left to create
        Dungeon.IllegalDungeonFormatException - Signals that the format of the input file being read is incorrect

    • Method Detail

      • goesBy

        Return true if the item's primary name equals the input string
        Parameters:
        name - string name of an item
        Returns:
        boolean returns whether the item's primary name is equal to the input or not
